review:
Visited for Paralysis Spasticity
Had a video consultation with the Dr all I can say he is very gentle and polite and listen to the problem of the patient very carefully. First he allow the  patient to share all his problem then explain the problem in a very simple language Thank you sir for your generous concern to the patient.

review: Good experience. Doctor listen very patiantly to our problems and suggest a very good medication.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited this doctor with all my conditions of stroke he made me do a Brain MRI when the reports were normal he said I don’t know what is the problem and when asked why is this happening he says”you should tell me” and didn’t bother to investigate further and prescribed some random medicine which made me so sick************* *** ********* ******* and I went to another general physician *** **** ********* ** ********* ** ***** ***** *** * ** ******* ******* *** ******* ******** ******* 

** ******* ****** ** **** ***** ***** **** ******** ** ******** ******** * ****** ***** **** *** ******** ** **** *** *** **** ** ***** **** ****** ******* ******* * ****** *******

tags: None
review:
Dr. Nikhil B attended to me when I was admitted to the hospital for stroke. He also consults at Cleveland Neurocare at Bilkehalli.

Honestly, he's one of the nicest people you can come across. He's a blessing in disguise as he gives enough time and energy to listen and attend to each patient before diagnosing issues and recommending a course of treatment. 

Today, he spent a good 45 minutes with us, to hear me out and inform me of every aspect of my neurological issues. My husband and I are really grateful to him for putting us at ease. We need doctors like these for complex neurological issues. I highly recommend Dr. Nikhil.B if you wish to be attended to properly.
